summary: The Fortinet Network Security Expert NSE4 course is designed to provide participants with the necessary skills and knowledge to achieve certification in the field of cybersecurity. The course covers a wide range of topics, including Introduction and Initial Configuration, Security Fabric, Firewall Policies, Network Address Translation (NAT), Firewall Authentication, Logging and Monitoring, Certificate Operations, Web Filtering, Application Control, Antivirus, Intrusion Prevention and Denial of Service, SSL VPN, and Dialup IPsec VPN. The course spans 10 sessions, totaling 50 academic hours, and is offered in a hybrid format, allowing participants to choose between in-person classes at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan or online via Zoom. The course is scheduled to start on December 13, 2024, with classes held on Tuesdays from 17:30 to 21:30 and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00. Participants will gain the skills required to become an Enterprise Firewall Administrator and prepare for the NSE exam (v7.0).

COURSE NAME: Fortinet Network Security Expert (NSE4)

COURSE OVERVIEW: This course is designed to provide participants with the necessary skills and knowledge to achieve the Fortinet Network Security Expert (NSE4) certification. It focuses on enterprise firewall administration and equips learners with the expertise required in the field of cybersecurity.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: December 13, 2024.
- Duration: 10 sessions.
- Academic Hours: 50 hours.
- Schedule: Tuesdays from 17:30 to 21:30, Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Hybrid learning format.
- Classes will be held at Bar-Ilan University campus in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, based on the participant's preference.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Introduction and Initial Configuration.
- Security Fabric.
- Firewall Policies.
- Network Address Translation (NAT).
- Firewall Authentication.
- Logging and Monitoring.
- Certificate Operations.
- Web Filtering.
- Application Control.
- Antivirus.
- Intrusion Prevention and Denial of Service.
- SSL VPN.
- Dialup IPsec VPN.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an admission interview and register, contact: 052-5886002.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: 
- The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University.
- The program is part of the dedicated programs division at Bar-Ilan University.

CERTIFICATIONS: Fortinet NSE4 Certification, Enterprise Firewall Administrator v7.0.

TUITION AND FEES: Information not provided in the text.
